p: The contraction of guinea pig bladder in response to the RC extract proved to be special, in that it was reduced by half following in vitro capsaicin pretreatment. This indicates that capsaicin-sensitive sensory nerves of the bladder wall are in some way involved in the excitatory effect of the RC extract (see Barth√≥ et al., 2004). Nevertheless, the RC extract and oil also induced bladder relaxation in pre-contracted preparations.
